EN.heading: Product & Brochure
EN.title: Actiflo – High speed water clarifier
features: Cutting edge micro-sand technology help reducing coagulant consumption by 30%
Specially designed hydro cyclone for recycling of micro sand making sure minimal operating cost
list: Up to 95% space saving compared to conventional flat bottom clarifier
Low operating cost with less coagulant consumption (~30% less coagulant consumption compared to other type of clarifier)
Plug & play completed package with onsite expert to optimize your operation
One of, if not the lowest operating cost clarifier on the market today
